value.title: ByuN gets the Reaper nerfed... AGAIN! (StarCraft 2)
value.excerpt: GL HF GG Mug: https://lowko.shop/products/gl-hf-gg-mug Best-of-3 series of top level StarCraft 2 between ByuN (Terran) and Solar (Zerg).
